summary: When a coolie's family is murdered by a group of gangsters and politicians, he swears revenge on them.
cast: Mithun Chakraborty|Mukesh Rishi|Mohan Joshi|Shakti Kapoor|Verna Raj|Harish Patel|Ishrat Ali|Rami Reddy|Deepak Shirke|Rana Jung Bahadur|Razak Khan|Gulshan Rana|Bajrangi|Arun Mathur|Sapna Sappu|Vinod Tripathi|Babbanlal Yadav
title: Gunda
